Text: what is this about, anyone know what language, tvteam, you have dozens of torrents, and everyone has that other stupid message, you post with a web address, take less time promoting something no one wants to visit, they are on a reputable torrent site. your not going to build your traffic by pushing that junk here, the reason people dl here is that its easy to get past the bs, and there are good torrent up-loaders like yourself, but it gets really frustrating when looking for what to dl, and there is nothing posted related to the movie, hell the spaces are there, just cut and past the description in the place where your advertisement is, the imdb link where it says IMDB, and the language where it says language. more people would actually download, raising your seeders, and your rating.
